overview: John has spent the past twenty years igniting some of the fastest technology ramps in Silicon Valley history. At Intel, John worked on the core Pentium team and helped major OEMs including HP adopt Intel platforms. John helped Genesys Telecom become the leader in call center software. While at Interwoven, John led the marketing team as the company became the leader in enterprise content management. Most recently John led marketing at XenSource which was acquired by Citrix. John enjoys coaching football and lacrosse in Palo Alto and trying to keep up with his wife and four children.
